getMinWorkTimeForEachTest: SELECT project.name, test.name, test.end_time - test.start_time FROM project JOIN test ON project.id = test.project_id ORDER BY project.name, test.name;
getProjectsWithAmountOfUniqueTests: SELECT project.name, COUNT(test.id) FROM project JOIN test ON project.id = test.project_id GROUP BY project.name;
getTestsAppliedBeforeCertainDate: SELECT project.name, test.name, test.end_time FROM project JOIN test ON project.id = test.project_id WHERE test.end_time > "2015-11-07" ORDER BY project.name;
getAmountOfTestsAppliedOnCertainBrowsers: SELECT COUNT(*) AS BROWSERS FROM test WHERE test.browser = 'Chrome' UNION  SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test WHERE test.browser = 'Firefox';
